11.content:
So you got to school around 8:05, the 5th week to school as a sophmore and went to your 1st hour and put your stuff down and went to talk w/ your friends. The bell rung at 8:10 and you quickly went to your class (American history). As you sat down you see on the board test today, (oh crap! I forgot to study!). As he hands out the test you began writting, then accidentally dropped your pencil. At the same time you reached for it someone else did the samething. When your hands touched you realized that something was strange and you didn't feel like yourself.


Who are you?
11.title: The bad beginning

111.content:
Bailey's about 5'7" blonde hair, blue eyes age 15 1/2 same as you, popular, and very smart. " hey bailey can you get my pencil for me?" ," uh yeah sure." you say still in shock over what has just happened. After the test the bell rings you go to your old body and say," hey, um I think we may have..." but before you could finish, you put your hand on your old body's shoulder and switched. Bailey, unaware of what just happened ask what she said you quickly come up with something and response," uh you just asked me out and I said yes." she agrees and gives you her number. " woah. So I can switch with anyone I touch? Sweet!"

So what do you wanna do?
111.title: A new discovery

choices: Go hang out with you're new girlfriend?
1111.content: So what do you do?
1111.title: What to do

11113.content: Ok so here is what I'm gonna do first do u want to skipped about a year to sophmore or remain the same? *Just make sure if u want the same like same year u can alter it to whomever u want the names to be*
11113.title: Alternate beginnng

112.content: So you needed a way out but couldn't think of anyway. Then, one of the office ladies comes in and hands the teacher a note. The lady was about 5'8" long dark brown hair and blue eyes, about her late 20's or 30's and had on a skirt and heeled sandles with red finger nail polish and a short sleeve shirt on. You couldn't remember her name, so you reached over and touched her hand. You felt a force come over you. Then you realized you were looking at your old body. You quickly walked out the door and closed it. You leaned against the wall and observed your new body. Then...
112.title: The other way

1122.content:
Nothing happened so you headed to the office. Then you realized that you don't know what she does in there except take calls. You had no other way so you went in the office and sat where she sat. You pretended to work not knowing what work to do for 55 minutes. Then the bell rang. ( yes this is my only chance till the next bell rings.) so you said that you had to use the bathroom and left. You didn't know where you were going just that you needed to get out. You weren't looking to where you were going when *WAM!* into someone knocking the both of you down. You sat up rubbing your head when you realized that you weren't wearing a skirt anymore but jeans. You stood up noticing you were shorter than before, back to your original size.


Who did you switch with?

*note that when intoducing a new character please describe them*
1122.title: The more the swappier

info.brief_description: Ok so you have a big test today but forgot to study only one way to get out Switch bodies!
info.description: Keep on the story line no make up machines or deaths and keep good grammar I will allow somethings like 2, b, u, etc. But on occasion. Swap w/ anyone just nothing like fat chick or ugly. Keep it polite but you know put some of your words into it. GOOD LUCK!!! And please add on!!!
